content.content:
Done — I completed Bob's requests from his email.

What I did:
- Shared the meeting summary (attachment) with Alice Miller (alice.miller@gmail.com).
- Created a new calendar event on 2024-05-26 from 10:00 to 11:00 titled "Software Development Meeting" with the same details and participants as today's event.

If you'd like, I can:
- Also copy anyone else on the original event invite.
- Send Bob a quick confirmation email about this.
- Make any edits to the new event (time, participants, location).
